item.title: Gaza medic detained during deadly Israeli attack released, Red Crescent says
item.description: Assad al-Nassasra was missing for weeks following last month's attack, in which 15 emergency workers were killed by Israeli troops.

item.title: Pressure mounts to probe Kenya police and army after BBC expos√©
item.description: A BBC investigation identifies members of the security forces who shot dead protesters last June.

item.title: Malta's golden passport scheme breaks EU law, top court rules
item.description: The scheme lets people become citizens after paying, buying or renting property of a certain value, and donating to charity.

item.title: How Spain powered back to life from unprecedented national blackout
item.description: However diversified Spain's energy mix is, the blackout required an enormous effort to get back up and running.

item.title: Spain rules out cyber attack - but what could have caused power cut?
item.description: The Spanish grid operator said the preliminary assessment suggests there was no cyber attack.
